hero_title: Celebrating the Art of Original Craftsmanship
hero_subtitle: OriginAll: A Marketplace for Unique, Handcrafted Products
about_text: OriginAll is a distinctive online marketplace dedicated to celebrating and supporting the art of original craftsmanship. We connect makers of unique, handcrafted products with enthusiasts who value authenticity and creativity.
footer_launch_message: OriginAll will officially launch on September 15th. Stay tuned for more!
hook_section_offer_text: Join us on launch day and be among the first to discover original, handcrafted products. Sign up now and receive an exclusive {discountType} off coupon!
hook_section_invite_text: Invite a friend and double your discount! Your friend will also receive a coupon of their choice.
hook_section_referral_message: Join OriginAll and get {discountType} off your first purchase!
our_mission_text: Our mission is to foster a community where creativity thrives and original craftsmanship is celebrated.
global_text: Discover a world of creativity and quality with our diverse range of handcrafted products.
contact_form_description: Connect with us, whether you're a client, seller, or media partner.
submission_error_message: An error occurred. Please try again later.
submission_client_message: Thank you for your interest! We look forward to seeing you at our launch.
submission_seller_message: Thank you for your interest in selling on OriginAll. Our sales team will contact you soon.
submission_media_message: Thank you for your interest in OriginAll. We'll be in touch with more information shortly.
submission_default_message: Thank you for contacting OriginAll. We'll get back to you soon.
